feed.title: Chau Hung Cheung, cyrus
feed.subtitle: 人之為學，不可自小，又不可自大

entry.title: Introduction-cyrus
entry.content:
# Welcome to My Blog!

My website! This is my very first post. Can't believe it, right? 😛 Same here. I've recently learned to use Hexo, and it's really nice stuff to learn, not gonna lie (ngl). I love this theme because it makes me feel relaxed :>

# Features of This Website

  1. Playlist: We have a music playlist featuring songs from JAY. I love his music very much.
  2. Sidebar
  3. Favicon & Failure Icon
  4. Menu Page
  5. ...

# Future Plans

I will be adding different functions to the website, such as a comment section and a character that will follow the pointer. I probably will get a domain name for it, and I always want to automate updates on GitHub because no one wants to manually move updates every time.

# Action Speaks Louder Than Words

Let's see my updates.
